publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3592 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Eco-driving Challenge—That the Parliament welcomes the Energy Saving Trusts’ Eco-driving initiative; notes that the three-year-long campaign aims to inform drivers of more economical driving techniques that result in energy savings and reduced fuel consumption; recognises the benefit of taking small steps to save energy in our everyday lives in addition to cutting fuel costs and promoting safer driving, and encourages people to take their own virtual eco-drive at www.energysavingtrust.org.uk/scotland.
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Cathy Peattie*, Bill Wilson*, Christina McKelvie*, Rob Gibson*, Liam McArthur*, Des McNulty*
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-3592 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Eco-driving Challenge—That the Parliament welcomes the Energy Saving Trusts’ Eco-driving initiative; notes that the three-year-long campaign aims to inform drivers of more economical driving techniques that result in energy savings and reduced fuel consumption; recognises the benefit of taking small steps to save energy in our everyday lives in addition to cutting fuel costs and promoting safer driving, and encourages people to take their own virtual eco-drive at www.energysavingtrust.org.uk/scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bob Doris, Joe FitzPatrick, Cathy Peattie, Bill Wilson, Christina McKelvie, Rob Gibson, Liam McArthur, Des McNulty, Ken Macintosh, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Gil Paterson
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Angela Constance*
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3592 Eco-driving Challenge (lodged on 3 March 2009) Robin Harper*
